name: Dead End
description:
You're trapped in a seemingly endless underground passage, so find your way through the endless "dead end".

“DEAD END” is a short ambient horror game/walk simulator Inspired by '8番出口', but has a completely different core mechanism, Requires you to explore, solve puzzles and find secrets in passages in hallucinogenic, liminal-space style galleries.

Yeah, I'm looking right behind you.

Play Time

10-40 minutes

As with '8番出口', you are welcome to record and distribute videos or live streams of the game, please include the name of the game.
We are not responsible for any damages caused by distributing videos of this game.

Reddit: PhantomPixel
